data.title: Ring Floodlight Cam: Secure Pedicure
data.description:
Protect your home with the world’s only motion-activated
security camera with built-in floodlights, a siren alarm and
two-way audio, so you can see, hear and speak to anyone
on your property from anywhere.

With the Ring Floodlight Cam, you can stop crime before it happens. That's security in a whole new light.

data.title: How to Install Ring Solar Panel
data.description:
Ring Solar Panel connects with your Stick Up Cam to provide a continuous charge. It mounts anywhere and only needs a few hours of direct sunlight to power your Stick Up Cam.

Follow this guide for step-by-step instructions on installing your Ring Solar Panel. If you run into any issues or have questions, contact Ring Community Support at 800.656.1918 or help@ring.com for additional assistance.

data.title: How to Set Up Ring Chime
data.description:
Ring Chime plugs into an indoor electrical outlet and plays a preset tone whenever someone presses your Ring Video Doorbell or activates its motion-detection sensors.

This video will help you set up your Ring Chime. Be sure to install your Ring Video Doorbell first, then set up Ring Chime, before connecting the units with the Ring App.

asset.title: How to Set Up Ring Chime
asset.description:
Ring Chime plugs into an indoor electrical outlet and plays a preset tone whenever someone presses your Ring Video Doorbell or activates its motion-detection sensors.

This video will help you set up your Ring Chime. Be sure to install your Ring Video Doorbell first, then set up Ring Chime, before connecting the units with the Ring App. For help with installing your Ring Video Doorbell, see this video: http://bit.ly/28ONaPt.

If you run into any issues or have questions, contact Ring Community Support at 800.656.1918 or help@ring.com for additional assistance.

data.title: How to Install Ring Video Doorbell
data.description:
Ring Video Doorbell features a motion-activated HD camera and two-way talk technology to allow homeowners to see, hear and speak to visitors from a smartphone, tablet or desktop.

Ring Video Doorbell comes with a free toolkit and step-by-step instructions to help you set up your device in minutes.

asset.title: How to Install Ring Video Doorbell
asset.description:
Ring Video Doorbell features a motion-activated HD camera and two-way talk technology to allow homeowners to see, hear and speak to visitors from a smartphone, tablet or desktop.

Ring Video Doorbell comes with a free toolkit and step-by-step instructions to help you set up your device in minutes. This is a quick overview of the installation process, but for more detailed instructions, see this video: http://bit.ly/28ONaPt. 

If you run into any issues or have questions, contact Ring Community Support at 800.656.1918 or help@ring.com for additional assistance.

data.title: How to Install Ring Video Doorbell Pro
data.description:
Ring Video Doorbell Pro has all the features of our popular Video Doorbell, plus enhanced motion detection, 1080p HD video, customizable faceplates and more. 

Video Doorbell Pro comes with our Pro Power Kit to connect to your existing doorbell wiring. This video will walk you through the process of installation.

When connecting Ring Video Doorbell Pro to older doorbell transformers, you may run into power issues, such as video freezing, choppy playback, night vision issues, no doorbell ringing or general power loss. Ring will provide a Pro Power Cable for users experiencing these issues for free.

asset.title: How to Install Ring Video Doorbell Pro
asset.description:
Ring Video Doorbell Pro has all the features of our popular Video Doorbell, plus enhanced motion detection, 1080p HD video, customizable faceplates and more. 

Video Doorbell Pro comes with our Pro Power Kit to connect to your existing doorbell wiring. This video will walk you through the process of installation.

When connecting Ring Video Doorbell Pro to older doorbell transformers, you may run into power issues, such as video freezing, choppy playback, night vision issues, no doorbell ringing or general power loss. Ring will provide a Pro Power Cable for users experiencing these issues for free. 

Contact Ring Community Support at 800.656.1918 or help@ring.com to ask about Pro Power Cable or for general assistance.

data.title: A Ring of Security
data.description: At Ring, our mission is to reduce crime in neighborhoods. With Ring Video Doorbell/Ring Video Doorbell Pro and Stick Up Cam, you can have a Ring of security at your home. With Ring, you're #AlwaysHome.

asset.title: A Ring of Security
asset.description:
At Ring, our mission is to reduce crime in neighborhoods. With Ring Video Doorbell/Ring Video Doorbell Pro and Stick Up Cam, you can have a Ring of security at your home. With Ring, you're #AlwaysHome.
